original_text: Now there was a famine in the land. So Abram went down to Egypt to sojourn there, for the famine was severe in the land.
korean_text: 그 땅에 기근이 들었으므로 아브람이 애굽에 거류하려고 그리로 내려갔으니 이는 그 땅에 기근이 심하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Now there was a famine in the land.
So Abram went down to Egypt to sojourn there,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 아브람은 애굽으로 내려가 거기서 머물렀으니,

sentences.original_text: for the famine was severe in the land.
